data.name: Symphonist of Scents
data.passiveDescription: ATK is increased by {{12//15//18//21//24%}}. When the equipping character is off-field, ATK is increased by an additional {{12//15//18//21//24%}}. After initiating healing, the equipping character and the character(s) they have healed will obtain the “Sweet Echoes” effect, increasing their ATK by {{32//40//48//56//64%}} for 3s. This effect can be triggered even if the equipping character is off-field.
